name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 4
description:
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 4 is an action-fighting game developed by CyberConnect2 Co.. It came out on 05-04-2007. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja 4 on PlayStation 2.
Hiroshi Matsuyama produced the game. Hiroshi Matsuyama directed the game. Chikayo Fukuda and Seizo Nakata scored the game.
